sect2.title: Psmisc Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Bison: bison Binutils: as, ld Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, echo, expr, hostname, install, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, sleep, tr, uname Diffutils: cmp Gawk: gawk GCC: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Gettext: msgfmt, xgettext Grep: egrep, grep M4: m4 Make: make Sed: sed Texinfo: makeinfo
